title: My Client Is Broken... Lost Lp and been demoted NEED HELP!
body:
So for the past two days for some reason every time i go into ranked champ select I will choose my laner and ban someone but as soon as thats over my client decides to freeze completely for about a minute and go on again, But whats really pissed me off is the fact that I've lost around 35-30lp of this right now and have been demoted from plat 3 to 4.

I've been trying to push for diamond in the last month of ranked season and i can't even play  ranked at all. 
I've repaired my client and it still happens

Riot please fix this and reimburse me for my lost Lp. All i wanna do is play some ranked and get to Diamond but I can't do that if I can't even enter a game
This has never happened before and it only started yesterday... Please fix.

replies.body: Unfortunate bro. But have you tried uninstalling the client and reinstalling it?
